title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description:
Define the project scope, objectives, requirements, and high-level architecture for the AI-powered code completion system. This should include the following key areas: 1) Identifying the target programming languages and frameworks to support (e.g., Python, JavaScript, Java), 2) Defining the user interface and interaction model for code completion suggestions (e.g., autocomplete dropdown, inline suggestions with customizable behavior), 3) Determining the required data sources and preprocessing steps for training the AI model (e.g., public APIs, popular open-source code repositories, programming books, and online coding challenges), 4) Outlining the AI model architecture and components (e.g., language model, code generation model, code refactoring module with support for multiple coding styles), 5) Specifying the integration points with IDEs and code editors (e.g., Visual Studio Code, IntelliJ IDEA, Sublime Text through plugins and APIs), 6) Defining the deployment and scaling strategy for serving the AI model (e.g., containerization using Docker or Kubernetes, cloud services like AWS Lambda or Google Cloud Functions), 7) Identifying potential challenges and risks (e.g., handling large codebases with efficient indexing, ensuring code quality and security through static analysis tools, managing model updates with version control and automatic retraining, dealing with code complexity and diversity by incorporating abstract syntax trees and type systems), 8) Providing a plan for evaluating and iterating on the system based on user feedback, usability studies, and A/B testing. Also, consider exploring opportunities for collaboration with popular IDEs and code editors to enhance their built-in code completion features.

**Update**: Assign this task to the Code Architect for a more detailed analysis of AI model architecture and components.

title: System Architecture Design for AICodeComplete
description: Design the overall system architecture for the AICodeComplete system, incorporating the following components and their interactions: 1) Code Editor Interface, 2) Context Analyzer, 3) Deep Learning Model, 4) Code Suggestion Engine, 5) Data Storage, 6) Model Training Pipeline. The design should address scalability, performance, fault tolerance, security, and maintainability aspects. Provide a high-level diagram and detailed component descriptions, including technologies, frameworks, and design patterns to be used (e.g., using React for frontend, Flask or Django for backend, PyTorch/TensorFlow for deep learning, PostgreSQL for data storage). Address potential challenges related to real-time code completion, model performance, handling large codebases, and model retraining/updates. Incorporate multi-tenancy support, multiple programming language support, IDE/code editor integration, API for third-party tool integration, and ensure the architecture supports incremental deployment and rollback strategies, as well as monitoring and logging capabilities. The design should also consider the following additional aspects: 1) Multi-tenancy support for different users or projects, 2) Support for multiple programming languages, 3) Integration with popular IDEs and code editors, 4) API for third-party tool integration. This task will be broken down into smaller tasks for easier implementation. Upon completion, update the rfc_state field to 'IMPLEMENTATION_IN_PROGRESS'.

title: Deep Learning Model Development
description: Research and develop the deep learning model(s) for context-aware code completion.

title: Code Editor Integration
description: Design and implement the integration with popular code editors for seamless code completion suggestions.

title: Data Collection and Preprocessing
description: Collect and preprocess code repositories and other relevant data for training the deep learning model(s).

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies for ensuring the quality and accuracy of the code completion system.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations in AICodeComplete
description: Perform a comprehensive review of potential security and privacy risks associated with the AI-powered code completion system. Propose mitigation strategies to address these risks, focusing on protecting user data and ensuring compliance with relevant regulations. This review should also consider the impact of deep learning models on data privacy and suggest approaches for maintaining model transparency, explainability, and fairness. The review will include a focus on secure data storage, secure communication between the system and users, anonymization techniques for user data, and transparent privacy policies. Recommendations will be provided for maintaining data integrity and implementing access controls.

title: Deployment and Continuous Integration/Delivery
description: Implement a robust deployment strategy and set up continuous integration and delivery pipelines.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user support resources for the code completion system.
